Material used.Description: Experiments were conducted using the HEK293 cell line transfected with *KIF5B* cDNA.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was reduced by approximately 30% for the variant NM_004924.4:c.1234A>G compared to wild-type controls.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent transfections and protein extractions were performed for each condition.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in duplicate on the Western blot.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type *KIF5B* cDNA was used as a positive control to confirm protein expression.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control to demonstrate background protein levels.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used to compare protein levels between experimental and control groups.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression between 80% and 120% of control levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression outside of 80%-120% of control levels.

Material used.Description: HEK293 cells were fixed and stained with antibodies against KIF5B.

Readout description.Result Description: Immunofluorescence revealed that the mutant KIF5B protein was mislocalized to the cytoplasm instead of the expected microtubule-associated localization.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent transfections and immunofluorescence experiments were performed.
